title: Save Arizona, Save America with Mark Finchem and Julie Kelly
itunes:title: Save Arizona, Save America with Mark Finchem and Julie Kelly
description:
Arizona voted Republican in five straight elections. Then, in suspicious circumstances, it swerved to electing Joe Biden in 2020. Charlie speaks to Arizona Secretary of State candidate Mark Finchem about what Arizona — and every other state — must do to make its voting secure in 2024. Then, he’s joined by Julie Kelly to find out why Nancy Pelosi had a whole documentary team with her on January 6, while the FBI seems totally uninterested in finding the missing DNC pipe bomber. Then, it’s off to Virginia, where Democrats have a new plan for helping kids get sex changes: Arresting their parents.

 

Support the show: http://www.charliekirk.com/support

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
